abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Consolidation of
            Collection and Pension Administration Reform Project for
            Serbia will be to improve the effectiveness and efficiency
            of the pension system through the modernization and
            streamlining of the institutional capacity in the pension
            system, improved pension system administration, developed
            capacity for policy identification, analysis and monitoring
            and increased public understanding of the system. From the
            time of its effectiveness in June 2005, the project has
            suffered implementation delays as a result of political
            instability and frequent changes in government. Both the
            project development objective rating and its Implementation
            progress rating are moderately satisfactory. It is the
            Bank's assessment that an 18 month extension will be
            prudent to ensure the completion of the development of the
            majority of the software solutions for the business
            processes, services and procurement of hardware for the
            central registry. The Government is, however, optimistic
            that the work can be finalized within 12 months and has
            objected to a longer extension at this time. Thus, this
            request is for a 12 month extension only. The Government has
            prepared a detailed action plan for the completion of the
            remaining project activities reflecting the one year
            extension. The action plan is found acceptable to the Bank.
            Should the completion of this project activity exceed the
            requested one year extension of the closing date, the
            Government has committed to financing remaining activities
            from its own resources. Alternatively, in such case, the
            Government could request another short extension and the
            World Bank team will be amenable to considering such a
            request. There are no outstanding audit reports for this
            project and the financial management rating is satisfactory.
            This will be the first extension of the project closing date.
